scripts.build:vanilla: tsc && npm run mkdir-if-not-exist && sed '$d' dist/event-handler.js > dist/vanilla/event-handler.js && sed '$d' dist/minimap.js > dist/vanilla/minimap.js && sed '$d' dist/sankey-chart-data.js > dist/vanilla/sankey-chart-data.js && sed '1d;$d;' dist/sankey-chart.js > dist/vanilla/sankey-chart1.js && sed '$d' dist/vanilla/sankey-chart1.js > dist/vanilla/sankey-chart.js && rm dist/vanilla/sankey-chart1.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:plain && npm run build:bundled:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:plain && npm run build:bundled:prod
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:prod && npm run build:vanilla
scripts.publish:npmx: git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
